description.value:
At 10th level, when another creature that you can see within 60 feet of you hits with a weapon attack or unarmed strike, you can use your reaction to increase the attack's velocity, causing the attack's target to take an extra 1d10 damage of the weapon's or unarmed strike's type.

Alternatively, if a creature within 60 feet of you takes damage from a fall, you can use your reaction to increase the fall's damage by 2d10.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest or until you expend a spell slot to use this reaction.

activation.condition: when another creature that you can see within 60 feet of you hits with a weapon attack or unarmed strike or a creature within 60 feet of you takes damage from a fall
